title: Requires the New York state energy research and development authority to submit an annual report detailing energy efficiency savings achieved in grant recipients' properties
summary: Requires the New York state research and development authority to examine energy efficiency savings achieved in grant recipients' properties; requires that an annual report be submitted to the governor and legislature.

       AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the
         New  York state energy research and development authority to submit an
         annual report detailing energy efficiency savings  achieved  in  grant
         recipients' properties

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The public authorities law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 1873 to read as follows:
    3    S  1873.  EXAMINATION AND REPORTING OF ENERGY EFFICIENCY GRANT RECIPI-
    4  ENTS; REQUIRED. 1. THE AUTHORITY SHALL INVESTIGATE THE EFFECTIVENESS  OF
    5  ALL  ENERGY  EFFICIENCY  GRANTS  AWARDED  TO  PROPERTIES IN THE STATE TO
    6  DETERMINE  THE  ENERGY  SAVINGS  GAINED  THROUGH  UPGRADES  AND  REPAIRS
    7  PERFORMED  WITH  GRANT  FUNDS.  THE AUTHORITY SHALL PROCURE ENERGY BILLS
    8  FROM PROPERTIES IN RECEIPT OF GRANT FUNDING THROUGH THE  UTILITY  CORPO-
    9  RATION THAT SERVES AS THE ENERGY PROVIDER ONE YEAR PRIOR TO THE UPGRADES
   10  AND  REPAIRS EXECUTED WITH GRANT FUNDING AND FOR TWO YEARS SUBSEQUENT TO
   11  THE PHYSICAL ENHANCEMENTS OF SUCH PROPERTY.  THE  AUTHORITY  SHALL  THEN
   12  ANALYZE THIS DATA TO DETERMINE THE ENERGY SAVINGS GAINED THROUGH CAPITAL
   13  IMPROVEMENTS  ACCOMPLISHED  WITH  GRANT  FUNDING.  THIS  ANALYSIS SHOULD
   14  ACCOUNT FOR MARKET RATE FLUCTUATIONS AND OTHER SUCH OUTSIDE FACTORS  NOT
   15  DIRECTLY  RELATED  TO  CAPITAL  UPGRADES  DESIGNED  TO  ENCOURAGE ENERGY
   16  SAVINGS. THIS DATA SHALL BE RECORDED IN AN ANNUAL REPORT  IN  ACCORDANCE
   17  WITH SUBDIVISION TWO OF THIS SECTION.
   18    2.  THE  AUTHORITY  SHALL FILE WITH THE LEGISLATURE, THE EXECUTIVE AND
   19  THE CHAIRMAN OF THE STATE ENERGY PLANNING BOARD AN ANNUAL REPORT DETAIL-
   20  ING THE ANALYSIS OF ENERGY SAVINGS OF PROPERTIES IN RECEIPT OF AUTHORITY
   21  GRANT FUNDING AND THE TOTAL ENERGY  SAVINGS  OF  SUCH  PROPERTIES.  SUCH
